statements: DELETE FROM donors WHERE full_name = 'Alice Smith';
DELETE FROM donors WHERE donation_amount > 5000 AND communication_preference = 'Email';
DELETE FROM donations WHERE donation_amount <= 1000 AND donation_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM contact_details WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
DELETE FROM donation_history WHERE contact_id = 10 AND donation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM communication_preferences WHERE contact_id = 100 AND email_opt_in = FALSE;
DELETE FROM donor_notes WHERE contact_id = 200 AND note_date < '2022-01-01';
